    1: import pytest
    2: 
    3: from pandas.core.dtypes.cast import construct_1d_object_array_from_listlike
    4: 
    5: 
    6: @pytest.mark.parametrize("datum1", [1, 2.0, "3", (4, 5), [6, 7], None])
    7: @pytest.mark.parametrize("datum2", [8, 9.0, "10", (11, 12), [13, 14], None])
    8: def test_cast_1d_array(datum1, datum2):
    9:     data = [datum1, datum2]
   10:     result = construct_1d_object_array_from_listlike(data)
   11: 
   12:     # Direct comparison fails: https://github.com/numpy/numpy/issues/10218
   13:     assert result.dtype == "object"
   14:     assert list(result) == data
   15: 
   16: 
   17: @pytest.mark.parametrize("val", [1, 2.0, None])
   18: def test_cast_1d_array_invalid_scalar(val):
   19:     with pytest.raises(TypeError, match="has no len()"):
   20:         construct_1d_object_array_from_listlike(val)
